decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension by virtue of its design and siting, would not relate well to the character and appearance of the host property and the surrounding area, which forms part of Kingston Hill/Coombe Hill Strategic Area of Special Character. It would therefore be contrary to Policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8,  DM10 and DM12 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012, and Policy Guidance 33 of the Residential Design Guide SPD.

The proposed single storey rear extension by virtue of its depth and siting, would detract from  the amenities of the adjoining occupiers and result in the loss of outlook and daylight to the neighbouring  property at 73 Vale Crescent. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM10 of the Core Strategy 2012 and Policy Guidance 33 of the Residential Design Guide SPD.
description: Erection of single storey rear extension
